Platforms: The platforms on which these settings are active (unless overridden).
MaxDistance: Effects of this type are culled beyond this distance.
MaxInstances:
Effects of this type will be culled when total active instances using this same EffectType exceeds this number.
If the effect type has a significance handler, instances are sorted by their significance and only the N most significant will be kept. The rest are culled.
If it does not have a significance handler, instance count culling will be applied at spawn time only. New FX that would exceed the counts are not spawned/activated.
MaxSystemInstances:
Effects of this type will be culled when total active instances of the same NiagaraSystem exceeds this number.
If the effect type has a significance handler, instances are sorted by their significance and only the N most significant will be kept. The rest are culled.
If it does not have a significance handler, instance count culling will be applied at spawn time only. New FX that would exceed the counts are not spawned/activated.
CullProxyMode: Controls what, if any, proxy will be used in place of culled systems.
MaxSystemProxies:
Limit on the number of proxies that can be used at once per system.
While much cheaper than full FX instances, proxies still incur some cost so must have a limit.
When significance information is available using a significance handler, the most significance proxies will be kept up to this limit.
VisibilityCulling: Settings controlling how systems are culled by visibility.
BudgetScaling: Settings related to scaling down FX based on the current budget usage.
bOverrideDistanceSettings: Controls whether we override the distance culling settings.
bOverrideInstanceCountSettings: Controls whether we override the instance count culling settings.
bOverridePerSystemInstanceCountSettings: Controls whether we override the per system instance count culling settings.
bOverrideVisibilitySettings: Controls whether we override the visibility culling settings.
bOverrideGlobalBudgetScalingSettings: Controls whether we override the global budget scaling settings.
bOverrideCullProxySettings: Controls whether we override the cull proxy settings.
bCullByDistance: Controls whether distance culling is enabled.
bCullMaxInstanceCount: Controls whether we should cull systems based on how many instances with the same Effect Type are active.
bCullPerSystemMaxInstanceCount: Controls whether we should cull systems based on how many instances of the system are active.
